name: ElasticExportGoogleShopping
license: GNU AFFERO GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 19 November 2007
description: This plugin adds the format GoogleShopping to the Elastic Export.

shortDescription.de: Die Integration des Datenformats GoogleShopping-Plugin ermöglicht die Artikeldatenübertragung zum Preisportal Google Shopping über den elastischen Export.
shortDescription.en: The integration of the data format GoogleShopping-Plugin enables the transfer of item data to the price search engine Google Shopping via the elastic export.

author: plentysystems AG
